neuromon.species.neurosama.name: Neurosama
neuromon.species.vedal.name: Vedal
neuromon.species.vedal-giga.name: Vedal
neuromon.species.gymbag.name: Gymbag
neuromon.species.gymbag.desc: They possess retractable propellers attached to the white handles, and the straps are used as limbs. Loners are extremely rare among the species. They prefer to gather in large swarms led by a single leader.
cobblemon.ability.whenyouregone.desc: Defeated allies give the Pokémon determination, slightly increasing its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats when it enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.abberdemon.desc: The Pokémon is possessed by an otherworldly entity that can occasionally attack foes when it uses a move on itself.
cobblemon.ability.fatheroftheyear.desc: The Pokémon transforms into its Giga form when it switches in after one of its creations faints.
cobblemon.move.boom.desc: The user unleashes its inner demon, causing a powerful explosion. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
